ModInfo.Name: X-Division 0.99.1
ModInfo.Author: Drages
ModInfo.Description: X-Division is a Total Overhaul mod with the idea of original X-Com research chain, micromanagement and long game play. 0.99.10 BETA is a balance/bug test version. Please check goldenhawks forums for details and reports. Enjoy! (Do NOT use with other mods except some visual mods/XCE balance and settings.)
